name: GetEnterpriseById
description:
Retrieve details of a Trello enterprise by ID.

Use this tool to obtain detailed information about a specific enterprise in Trello by providing its ID.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the enterprise you want to retrieve from Trello.

value_schema.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.

parameters.name: enterprise_fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include, such as `id`, `name`, `displayName`, `prefs`, and more.

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of: `id`, `name`, `displayName`, `prefs`, `ssoActivationFailed`, `idAdmins`, `idMembers` (Note that the members array returned will be paginated if `members` is 'normal' or 'admins'. Pagination can be controlled with member_startIndex, etc, but the API response will not contain the total available result count or pagination status data. Read the SCIM documentation [here]() for more information on filtering), `idOrganizations`, `products`, `userTypes`, `idMembers`, `idOrganizations`

parameters.name: member_inclusion_type
parameters.description: Specify which member roles to include: `none`, `normal`, `admins`, `owners`, `all`.

value_schema.description: One of: `none`, `normal`, `admins`, `owners`, `all`

parameters.name: member_fields
parameters.description: Specify one of: `avatarHash`, `fullName`, `initials`, `username` to filter member fields.

value_schema.description: One of: `avatarHash`, `fullName`, `initials`, `username`

parameters.name: member_filter_query
parameters.description: A SCIM-style query to filter members. Overrides member types ('normal', 'admins', etc.) and paginates the member array.

value_schema.description: Pass a [SCIM-style query](/cloud/trello/scim/) to filter members. This takes precedence over the all/normal/admins value of members. If any of the member_* args are set, the member array will be paginated.

parameters.name: member_sorting_order
parameters.description: SCIM-style sorting value for members. Use '-' prefix for descending order, no prefix for ascending.

value_schema.description: This parameter expects a [SCIM-style](/cloud/trello/scim/) sorting value prefixed by a `-` to sort descending. If no `-` is prefixed, it will be sorted ascending. Note that the members array returned will be paginated if `members` is 'normal' or 'admins'. Pagination can be controlled with member_startIndex, etc, but the API response will not contain the total available result count or pagination status data.

parameters.name: member_sort
parameters.description: Use a SCIM-style sorting value prefixed by '-' for descending or ascending if no prefix. Note: Deprecated `member_sortBy` parameter.

value_schema.description: Deprecated: Please use member_sort. This parameter expects a [SCIM-style sorting value](/cloud/trello/scim/). Note that the members array returned will be paginated if `members` is `normal` or `admins`. Pagination can be controlled with `member_startIndex`, etc, and the API response's header will contain the total count and pagination state.

parameters.name: sort_members_order
parameters.description: Order the sorting of members. Acceptable values are `ascending`, `descending`, `asc`, or `desc`. Note: This parameter is deprecated and `member_sort` is preferred.

value_schema.description: Deprecated: Please use member_sort. One of: `ascending`, `descending`, `asc`, `desc`

parameters.name: member_start_index
parameters.description: Specify the starting index for paginated members. Accepts any integer between 0 and 100.

value_schema.description: Any integer between 0 and 100.

parameters.name: member_count
parameters.description: Specify the number of members to retrieve, ranging from 0 to 100.

parameters.name: organization_inclusion
parameters.description: Determine scope of organizations to retrieve with the enterprise: 'none', 'members', 'public', or 'all'.

value_schema.description: One of: `none`, `members`, `public`, `all`

parameters.name: organization_fields_value
parameters.description: Specify valid values for nested organization fields as accepted by the API.

value_schema.description: Any valid value that the [nested organization field resource]() accepts.

parameters.name: organization_memberships_list
parameters.description: Comma-separated list indicating organization memberships such as `me`, `normal`, `admin`, `active`, `deactivated`.

value_schema.description: Comma-seperated list of: `me`, `normal`, `admin`, `active`, `deactivated`

parameters.name: include_paid_account_information
parameters.description: Include paid account information in the returned workspace objects if set to true. If false, it will be excluded.

value_schema.description: Whether or not to include paid account information in the returned workspace objects
